tourBios.carHigh:
2015: After 54 holes was one stroke behind the leaders at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open in Victoria, British Columbia. A final-round 69 resulted in a T5 at the Uplands GC, the second stop on the season...Continued his strong play with a T4 finish at the Syncrude Boreal Open.

2014: Made six cuts in eights starts in the season, capped by a solo-fourth finish at the Wildfire Invitational, thanks to four rounds in the 60s. 2013: Posted three top 10s and a T2 at the Dakota Dunes Open to finish 14th on the money list. 2012: Made two cuts in just three starts, with a season-best T47 finish at the Times Colonist Island Savings Open. 2011: Made four cuts in six events, with his best finish a T10 at the Tour Championship. 2010: Best finish was a T7 at the Tour Championship. 2009: Collected back-to-back T4s at the Times Colonist Open and the Mexican PGA Championship. Finished 5th at The Players Cup. 2008: Stellar year which saw his winning the ROLEX Player of the Year and the Order of Merit...First victory came via a playoff duel with Tommy Barber at the Stockton Classic...A week later, he triumphed again at the Corona Mazatlan Mexican PGA Championship...In July, he cared a 66-68-65-67 to win by three at the TELUS Edmonton Open...Scored 11 top-10 finishes in 12 events, including a pair of T2s at The Players Cup and Seaforth Country Classic. Has also competed on the PGA TOUR and the Web.com Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named a first-team All Pac-10 member in 2003...Also won the Oregon Duck Invitational that same season.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 1st on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T 3 times.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T53rd in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
